220-Access is restricted to authorized persons only.
220 All traffic is logged and violators prosecuted to the full extent of the la
530 Login or password incorrect!
214-The following commands are recognized:
   ABOR   ADAT   ALLO   APPE   AUTH   CDUP   CLNT   CWD 
   DELE   EPRT   EPSV   FEAT   HASH   HELP   LIST   MDTM
   MFMT   MKD    MLSD   MLST   MODE   NLST   NOOP   NOP 
   OPTS   P@SW   PASS   PASV   PBSZ   PORT   PROT   PWD 
   QUIT   REST   RETR   RMD    RNFR   RNTO   SITE   SIZE
   STOR   STRU   SYST   TYPE   USER   XCUP   XCWD   XMKD
   XPWD   XRMD
214 Have a nice day.
211-Features:
 MDTM
 REST STREAM
 SIZE
 MLST type*;size*;modify*;
 MLSD
 UTF8
 CLNT
 MFMT
 EPSV
 EPRT
211 End

TOWN DEPARTMENTS AND SERVICES
  1. WHAT'S NEW
  2. CALENDAR
  1. WHAT'S NEW

  1. Spring into Green is Right Around the Corner

    Join us in celebrating Earth Day, Keep Los Gatos Beautiful Month and environmental awareness. Come on down to Town Plaza Park on Sunday, April 14th from 10am – 1pm and enjoy family friendly activities... Read on...

  2. Neighborhood Watch & CERT Presentation

    On Thursday, April 25 from 6:00 p.m. to 8:00 p.m. The Los Gatos-Monte Sereno Police Department will host a presentation on the concept of combining Neighborhood Watch and C.E.R.T. resources as an amplified community preparedness approach..... Read on...

  3. Apply to Serve on a Town Board, Commission, or Committee

    The Town Council appoints members of the public to specific Town Boards, Commissions, and Committees (collectively "Commissions"). Read on...

  4. General Plan Update

    The General Plan Background Report Read on...

  5. Stay up to date!

    The Town of Los Gatos has various social media outlets to follow. Below are a few of the links, and you can also find us on NextDoor! Read on...

Town Administrative Offices are Closed on the following Holidays:

  • Martin Luther King 
  • Presidents' Day
